StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [spInsertTransLog]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWA_ID int, @ORGANIZATION_ID int, @TRAN_TYPE varchar(20), @TRAN_NAME varchar(50), @NEW_TRAN_VALUE varchar(50), @USER_LOGIN varchar(50), @TRANSACTION_DATE Date.me
As /************************************************************************************************************************** Name: spInsertTransLog
Purpose: To insert a row into the TRANS_LOG table of the MCRISS-RS database. This is a generic procedure is called from triggers placed on transac.onal tables in the database.
Parameters: NWA_ID ORGANIZATION_ID TRAN_TYPE NEW_TRAN_NAME NEW_TRAN_VALUE USER_LOGIN TRANSACTION_DATE
Crea.on Date: 15 July, 2000
Developer: Reginald Holt, Booz.Allen & Hamilton
Modi.ca.ons:
Date Modi.ca.on
**************************************************************************************************************************/ Begin
Insert into TRANS_LOG (NWA_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, TRAN_TYPE, TRAN_NAME, NEW_TRAN_VALUE, USER_LOGIN, TRANSACTION_DATE)
values
(@NWA_ID, @ORGANIZATION_ID, @TRAN_TYPE, @TRAN_NAME, @NEW_TRAN_VALUE, @USER_LOGIN, @TRANSACTION_DATE) End
